lib

Class Vector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.Vector2

  • public class Vector2
extends java.lang.Object
    The Vector2 class represents a 2x1 matrix vector and provides common operations on said object. Some design notes:
    • The cross product is returned as a float, not a 3rd dimensional vector despite that it represents a vector orthogonal to any 2 input vectors.
    • Angles are not stored as fields; all angles are calculated when needed.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Robert Meade

      • cross

        public float cross(Vector2 v)
        The cross method returns the cross product of this and another vector as a float. This value is indicative of a vector orthogonal to the 2 vectors involved in its computation but is not returned as a 3rd dimensional vector object.
        Parameters:
        v - vector to compute cross product with
        Returns:
        cross product as float
